properties.description:
Transform data Activities can be used to process and transform data in computer environments such as Azure data bricks or Azure HDInsight or Azure Data lake Analytics etc.
execute data flow activity
azure function activity
custom activity
databricks jar activity
databricks python activity
data explorer command activity
data lake U-SQL Activity
HDInsight Hive Activity
HDInsight MapReduce Activity
HDInsight Pig Activity
HDInsight Spark Activity
HDInsight Streaming Activity
Machine learning Batch Execution Activity
Machine learning update Resource Activity
Machine learning Execute pipeline Activity
Stored procedure Activity

1. Dataflow feature in Azure data factory will allow you to develop graphical data transformation logic that can be executed as activities in ADF pipelines.
2. your data flow will execute on your own Azure Data Bricks cluster for scaled out data processing using spark.
3. ADF internally handles all the code translation, spark optimization and execution of transformation.

1. Switch Activity provides the same functionality that switch statement provides in programming languages.
2. It evaluates a set of activities corresponding to a case that matches the condition evalution.

activities.name: Switch1
activities.description:
1. Switch Activity provides the same functionality that switch statement provides in programming languages.
2. It evaluates a set of activities corresponding to a case that matches the condition evolution.

scriptLines: disjoint: false) ~> split1@(ItDept, HrDept, PayrollDept, miscellaneousDept)

properties.description: Stored procedure activity is one of the transformation activities that Data Factory supports. We run stored procedure as one of the step using this activity.

MDF are visually designed data transformations in ADF. Data flows allow data engineers to develop graphical data transformation logic without writing code.
2. Data flows are executed as activities within ADF pipeline using Data Flow Activities.
3. ADF internally handles all the code translation, spark optimization and execution of transformation.

activities.name: Copy data From MySQL to SA

dependsOn.activity: Copy data From MySQL to SA
